question: Carmen Reinhart, who was seen in news recently, is the new Chief economist and Vice president of which global institution?
explanation:
The World Bank has recently named economic expert Carmen Reinhart as its new vice president and chief economist. 
Carmen, who works as a professor at Harvard University, is also an adviser and contributor to the World Bank debt transparency discussions. She is a member of the IMF external advisory group working on policy challenges, including the coronavirus pandemic and its economic impact. She has published a book titled "This Time is Different: Eight Centuries of Financial Folly" together with economist Kenneth Rogoff.
